news.title: 王室、绑架、爆炸！全球炸锅
美主播母亲疑遭绑架，家人视频恳求“我们愿付钱”
news.title0: US news anchor Savannah Guthrie says 'we will pay' in plea for mother's return
news.content: 美国NBC主播萨凡纳·格思里的84岁母亲在家中被绑架。家人发布视频向潜在绑匪喊话，表示愿意支付赎金以求母亲安全归来。
news.content0: US news anchor Savannah Guthrie and her family have released a new video pleading for the safe return of their mother.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 爱泼斯坦邮件揭露安德鲁王子奢华告别晚宴内幕
news.title0: Emails reveal more details of Epstein's celeb dinner for Andrew
news.content: 最新公开的爱泼斯坦邮件显示，安德鲁王子2010年声称的“告别会”实为一场名流云集的奢华晚宴，事后他还向爱泼斯坦发送节日问候。
news.content0: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's last known face-to-face meeting with Jeffrey Epstein was in New York in December 2010.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 米兰冬奥会开幕日爆发抗议冲突，六人被捕
news.title0: Italian police arrest protesters after clash in Olympic host city Milan
news.content: 意大利米兰冬奥会开幕当天，数千人上街抗议生活成本等问题，部分示威者与警方发生冲突，投掷石块并燃放信号弹，六人被捕。
news.content0: Six people have been arrested after police clashed with protesters in Milan, one of the hosts of the Winter Olympic Games, during the first day of the competition.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 巴基斯坦致命风筝节解禁回归，当局加强安全措施
news.title0: Famous but deadly kite flying festival returns after 19-year ban
news.content: 巴基斯坦拉合尔著名的“巴萨特”风筝节在因致命事故被禁19年后回归。当局采取限时、禁售危险线材等措施，试图确保活动安全。
news.content0: In the streets of Lahore there are hints that the kite flying festival, Basant, has returned. Someone is fishing a kite from electricity cables, the distant sound of a drum beat, a flash of neon when you look up in the walled city's narrow streets to a stretch of sky. This party is above.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 摇滚乐队“3 Doors Down”主唱布拉德·阿诺德因癌症去世
news.title0: 3 Doors Down lead singer Brad Arnold dies at 47
news.content: 美国著名摇滚乐队“3 Doors Down”主唱兼词曲作者布拉德·阿诺德在与癌症抗争后去世，享年47岁。乐队以《Kryptonite》等金曲闻名。
news.content0: The lead singer and songwriter of 3 Doors Down, Brad Arnold, has died after a battle with cancer, the rock band announced on X. He was 47.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 威廉王子首访沙特引关注，将晤争议王储
news.title0: Why Prince William's Saudi Arabia visit is a diplomatic maze
news.content: 英国威尔士亲王威廉应政府要求首次访问沙特阿拉伯，此行聚焦能源转型与青年议题，并将与颇具争议的王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼会面。
news.content0: "He didn't flinch when the request came in."
news.author: BBC

news.title: 优步因司机性侵案被判赔偿850万美元
news.title0: Uber must pay $8.5 million in driver sexual assault case, jury says. Here’s what it could mean for thousands of similar cases
news.content: 美国亚利桑那州一陪审团裁定，优步公司须向一名声称遭其司机强奸的女性支付850万美元赔偿金。此案可能影响数千起类似索赔。
news.content0: A jury found that Uber must pay $8.5 million to a woman who said one of its drivers raped her. The decision could set the stage for payments to thousands of other passengers who filed similar claims against the rideshare company.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 巴基斯坦清真寺遭自杀式炸弹袭击，致数十人死伤
news.title0: Suicide bomber kills dozens in Pakistan mosque
news.content: 巴基斯坦首都伊斯兰堡一座什叶派清真寺遭自杀式炸弹袭击，造成至少32人死亡、逾160人受伤。极端组织“伊斯兰国”宣称负责。
news.content0: A suicide bomber killed dozens of people and injured more than 160 during Friday prayers at a Shiite Muslim mosque in Pakistan’s capital Islamabad, authorities said.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 特朗普被指打破禁忌，欲控制委内瑞拉石油
news.title0: Trump’s Oil Grab in Venezuela Shatters an American Taboo
news.content: 美媒报道，特朗普政府正寻求直接控制委内瑞拉石油资源，此举被指打破了美国为避免“为石油而战”指责而长期遵循的禁忌。
news.content0: President George W. Bush said he was invading Iraq to keep America safe. But critics saw a hidden motive: oil.
news.author: NYTimes
